ch0109_40_kudari/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Good to
see you!
ch0109_40_kudari/0101_0701_02_10:
If there’s anything I, Emmet, can do to help,
just let me know!
ch0109_40_kudari/7101_0701_01_10:
I like my Battle Subway uniform. But sometimes a
tuxedo jacket like this is nice, too.
ch0109_40_kudari/7101_0701_02_10:
I’m still getting used to it, but the monocle is
stylish, and I feel like a proper butler.
ch0109_40_kudari/7102_0701_01_10: Escavalier can charge with incredible force.
ch0109_40_kudari/7102_0701_02_10: He’s fast and strong, just like a train.
ch0109_40_kudari/7102_0701_03_10:
But I heard there’s a Pokémon called Sirfetch’d
that can stop Escavalier in its tracks.
ch0109_40_kudari/7102_0701_04_10:
I hear there’s a famous painting depicting the two
dueling. I’ll have to check it out if I ever
visit Galar!
ch0109_40_kudari/7103_0701_01_10:
Escavalier is a unique Pokémon that evolves
from Karrablast.
ch0109_40_kudari/7103_0701_02_10:
Karrablast only evolves when you trade it for
a Shelmet.
ch0109_40_kudari/7103_0701_03_10:
My Escavalier was originally Ingo’s Karrablast. I’m
going to continue taking good care of it.
ch0109_40_kudari/7104_0701_01_10:
Pasio’s team battles are great, but how about a
Double Battle against me?
ch0109_40_kudari/7104_0701_02_10:
In Double Battles, the combination of Pokémon
is key!
ch0109_40_kudari/7104_0701_03_10: I think battling you would be fun!
ch0109_40_kudari/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m already in uniform. Maybe I should try to find
someone to serve.
ch0109_40_kudari/7105_0701_03_10:
I know that you trust me, and I can be of use to
you! Sounds fun, right?
ch0109_40_kudari/1701_0701_02_10: If you’re interested, I’d like you to have it!
ch0109_40_kudari/1701_0702_01_10: You can never be too prepared. Use it wisely.
ch0109_40_kudari/2501_0701_01_10:
When serving people, I’ve found that my
experience from the Battle Subway comes
in handy.
ch0109_40_kudari/2501_0701_02_10:
For instance, when walking down a road, it’s
important to make sure the road is safe.
ch0109_40_kudari/2501_0701_03_10: Right side, clear! Left side, clear! All aboard!
ch0109_40_kudari/2501_0702_01_10:
If you’re ever out alone, please feel free to call
on me.
ch0109_40_kudari/2501_0702_02_10: I’ll get you to your destination safe and sound!
ch0109_40_kudari/2511_0701_01_10: I was talking to Ingo the other day.
ch0109_40_kudari/2511_0701_02_10:
He said if we ever reach our final stop as
Subway Bosses, he’d like to find a way to
serve others for a living.
ch0109_40_kudari/2511_0701_03_10: Even when the tracks end, the journey continues!
ch0109_40_kudari/2511_0702_01_10:
Watching Darach makes me think a life working as
a butler could be fun, too!
ch0109_40_kudari/2511_0702_02_10: I’m glad I came to Pasio!
ch0109_40_kudari/2511_0702_03_10:
I met you, and the world around me has become
even larger!
ch0109_40_kudari/3001_0701_01_10:
Fueled up! Full speed ahead! I can keep going all
the livelong day!
ch0109_40_kudari/3003_0701_01_10:
Victory is just up these tracks, and I won’t let
anyone derail me—not even you!
ch0109_40_kudari/3005_0701_01_10:
Pasio doesn’t have any trains, does it? That makes
me a little sad.
